title: [Self-Directed] Radiological Technology Education Course Utilizing Virtual Simulation

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational radiation physics and anatomical knowledge
context.additional_context: Hybrid learning combining actual clinical environment simulations and theoretical instruction for radiation technology education institutions and industry professionals

learning_goals: Patient positioning techniques can be performed with over 90% accuracy in a virtual simulation environment
Identify and apply at least eight equipment operation protocols to minimize radiation exposure risks
Achieve a score of 85 or above in simulation-based assessments to demonstrate clinical application-level practical skills
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
